long_description: An electric mountain bike with a RockShox fork to smooth out the trails, the Currie E3 Peak Bike uses an powerful centerdrive motor to boost your pedaling and make riding any distance more fun. A battery-powered motor assists you to make pedaling easy, and if you're ready to relax, you can switch modes to "twist and go" and cruise without pedaling. Powered by a frame-mounted, removable lithium-ion battery pack that you can charge anywhere. LCD showing speed, distance and time is mounted conveniently on the handlebar, and remote button lets you operate the motor without moving your hands from the handlebar. RockShox front fork offers 100mm of travel with lockout, and hydraulic disc brakes offer powerful stopping on any trail. Battery range of the pedal-assist mode is 25 - 30 mi.; motor tops out at a safe speed of 20 mph or 28 mph with hard pedaling. Battery is easy to detach from the frame for simple recharging (charger included) or for added security when you're locking the bike up outside. 9 speeds offer smooth and easy pedaling. Please note: battery range distances for the the Currie E3 Peak Bike can vary due to factors such as rider and gear weight, amount of rider pedaling and terrain. Specs are subject to change.
